name: Love LoveGod
description:
Love when the Lovegod looks at you. Hate when he looks away.

Pick up flowers, offer them to the LoveGod or use them to hit your foe. But never, never be violent under the mighty eye of the LoveGod...

This game is for 2 players and exclusively played with gamepads.

Team:

Developers: Yanis Berry and Yannis Attard

Graphic Designers: Bao Linh Vo and GC Sozzi

Game Designers: Kê-Vinh Sagot, Simon-Pierre Mattei, Guillaume Laugé

Sound Designer: Maxime Touchon

special thanks to Lucile :)
